        <item>
            <title><![CDATA[England win but NZ reach T20 tri-series final]]></title>
            <description><![CDATA[England are out of the Twenty20 tri-series despite a two-run win over New Zealand, who will face Australia in the final.]]></description>
            <link>http://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/cricket/43103277</link>

        </item>
        <item>
            <title><![CDATA[T20 internationals should be scrapped - Bayliss]]></title>
            <description><![CDATA[International teams should not play Twenty20 cricket, according to England coach Trevor Bayliss.]]></description>

        <item>
            <title><![CDATA[Plunkett out of England T20s and ODIs with injury]]></title>
            <description><![CDATA[Liam Plunkett misses the remainder of England's Twenty20 tri-series with New Zealand and Australia with a hamstring injury.]]></description>

        <item>
            <title><![CDATA[Australia beat New Zealand with record T20 chase]]></title>
            <description><![CDATA[Australia score the highest run chase in Twenty20 international history as they beat New Zealand with seven balls remaining.]]></description>
